synopsis.text: His cheerful disposition and carefree spirit make Taiyou Takada an instant standout in his new fifth-grade class. Unaware of the social dynamics, he is drawn to his quiet classmate, Akane Nishimura, who is infamously known as the 'Grim Reaper.' Despite her gloomy demeanor and the teasing she endures from her peers, Taiyou finds Akane fascinating and decides to befriend her. As the summer unfolds, the pair embarks on a series of adventures that range from poolside escapades to mesmerizing firework displays. Along the way, an extraordinary friendship blossoms, as Taiyou's infectious enthusiasm helps Akane break free from her shell and embrace the joy of childhood. This delightful tale of friendship and self-discovery is sure to warm hearts and remind us all of the magic of summer.
